name: get_tournaments_for_league
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool league_of_legends_esports.
Tool description: This api gives you all of the lol esports leagues , vods, tournaments, match , game , event details with videos , scheadule , standings, teams and their players. And live game score.
API description: This endpoint can gives you all of the tournaments for league id. You can get all league id from the Get Leagues endpoint . If you want you can get all tournaments data without filtering leagues.

leagueid.description: The ID of the league for which to retrieve tournaments. Defaults to '101097443346691685'.
